description:
Horse and Deer
Bunji and Ma are at home doing homework together. When Mom observes the two of them, the two of them just keep on showing the same level of stupidity...
Cram School
Chi, who has gone to cram school first, has caused Mom and her friends to decide their children should go to cram school too. But there`s an examination before entering the cram school.
Complete Loss to Your Eye
Dad`s ideal man, that is, dandyism and wildness, a man back in those old days... In an imaginary world, Dad starts to act like one, but...
Do You Know Where My Shoes Are?
One autumn morning, Dad woke up and felt like going for a walk. When he got to the doorway, there was a pair of shoes that he didn`t recognize. There are no guests and they aren`t his either. Just what is going on...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Horse and Deer / Cram School / In your Eyes / Do You Know Where My Shoes Are?
馬と鹿 / 塾 / 君の瞳に, 完敗 / ボクの靴, 知りませんか?
